DataElement.preferredName: Practitioners Engaged in Applied Research and Learning Network Patient Clinical Trial Exclusion Criteria PRL0705 Type
DataElement.preferredDefinition: the elements of a personal medical history which would prevent an individual from participating in a specific clinical trial (PRL0705) sponsored by Practitioners Engaged in Applied Research and Learning Network (PEARL), an infrastructure to conduct office-based research that will answer the questions facing general dental practitioners in the routine care of their patients.

ObjectClass.preferredName: Practitioners Engaged in Applied Research and Learning Network Patient
ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: An infrastructure to conduct office-based research that will answer the questions facing general dental practitioners in the routine care of their patients.:A person who requires medical care.

Concepts.longName: Practitioners Engaged in Applied Research and Learning Network
Concepts.definition: An infrastructure to conduct office-based research that will answer the questions facing general dental practitioners in the routine care of their patients.
A person who receives medical attention, care, or treatment, or who is registered with medical professional or institution with the purpose to receive medical care when necessary.

Property.preferredDefinition: A type of research study that tests how well new medical treatments or other interventions work in people.  Such studies test new methods of screening, prevention, diagnosis, or treatment of a disease.  The study may be carried out in a clinic or other medical facility.  Also called a clinical study.:Elements of a personal medical history which would prevent an individual from participating in a specific clinical trial.

Concepts.definition: A type of research study that tests how well new medical treatments or other interventions work in people.  Such studies test new methods of screening, prevention, diagnosis, or treatment of a disease.  The study may be carried out in a clinic or other medical facility.  Also called a clinical study.
Elements of a personal medical history which would prevent an individual from participating in a specific clinical trial.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: trial-specific criteria that a patient must meet to be enrolled.

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: the exclusion criteria, in which all responses must be 'no', used to determine if a patient/participant is eligible for Practitioners Engaged in Applied Research and Learning Network (PEARL) clinical trial PRL0705.
